field.value: WcfFacility - unable to specify endpoint name

field.name: description
field.value:
Hi,
See - http://stackoverflow.com/questions/15138565/error-resolving-service-using-windsor-3-2-0-0-wcffacility-in-asp-net-mvc3
The endpoint name passed to FromConfiguration() appears to be ignored - any value fails with the "Could not find endpoint element with name 'service' .... " exception, unless you use the value "service" in web.config.
Cheers
